name: INBoatTrip
desc: The information that describes a boat trip.

items.name: init(provider: String?, boatName: String?, boatNumber: String?, tripDuration: INDateComponentsRange, departureBoatTerminalLocation: CLPlacemark, arrivalBoatTerminalLocation: CLPlacemark)
items.desc: Creates a boat trip with the specified contents and attributes.

items.name: var provider: String?
items.desc: The operator of the boat line.

items.name: var boatNumber: String?
items.desc: The number associated with the boat.

items.name: var tripDuration: INDateComponentsRange
items.desc: The timespan of the boat trip from departure to arrival.

items.name: var departureBoatTerminalLocation: CLPlacemark
items.desc: The place where the boat trip starts.

items.name: var arrivalBoatTerminalLocation: CLPlacemark
items.desc: The place where the boat trip ends.
